      nullable: !(value$2 == null) ? value$2 : undefined,
      nonNullable: value$1.nonNullable

  };
}

function serialize(value) {
  let value$1 = value.customScalarField;
  let value$2 = value$1.nonNullable;
  let value$3 = value$1.nullable;
  let nullable = value$3 !== undefined ? value$3 : null;
  let value$4 = value$1.__typename;
  let customScalarField = {
    __typename: value$4,
    nullable: nullable,
    nonNullable: value$2
  };
  return {
    customScalarField: customScalarField
  };
}

function serializeVariables(inp) {
  let a = inp.opt;
  return {
    opt: a !== undefined ? a : undefined,
    req: inp.req
  };
}

function makeVariables(opt, req, param) {
  return {
    opt: opt,
    req: req
  };
}
